Text: Ciiiiid! It's no use hiding!

(She's still after me?! Talk about a stage five
clinger...)

You promised to have lunch with me today, remember?
Now come on out!

(More like you coerced me...　Anyway, it's gonna be
a real pain if she catches me.)

(But! Make it to that totally side character hiding
spot I found the other day, and I'm home free! All I
gotta do then is wait out the storm—)
Oh my...
Cid! Why are you here?!

R-Rose... Why're you in such a side chara—I mean,
secluded spot?

I often come here when I need to do some thinking
alone. I never would have thought you knew about this
place, too...
Heehee, maybe it was fate that brought us both here?
(As always, she's stuck on something weird...)

...But no, this isn't fate, is it? You saw me looking
troubled and came running to the rescue... Isn't that
right?
In that case, I must lay bare my heart. Please listen to my woes, Cid...!
Uh... I'm actually a little busy at the moment—

...I know you're around here somewhere, Cid!
You can't hide from me!
Cl-Claire...?!
That voice... Is she looking for you?
...Think I'll stay here a little longer after all.
Oh, I see! Then let's chat while you do!

So, the truth is, I'm unsure what to do for the
academy's anniversary ceremony...
R-Really...

It's tradition for the student council president to
do a performance... But I'm ashamed to say that I'm
at a loss for ideas.

Well, why not just stick to what you know? Like a
sword dance or something.

I had considered that, but given that it's a special
occasion, I wanted to make it enjoyable for the
students.

If you don't mind, could you help me brainstorm? You
being you, I'm sure you'll have some excellent ideas!
Well, since you put me on the spot like that...

(Not gonna lie, I couldn't care less about the
ceremony... But leaving here and getting caught by
Claire is something I'd like to avoid...)

(Anyway, I'll just say whatever and wing it from
there.)
Well... How about singing and dancing?

Hm, like a concert. That does sound like something
the students would enjoy. Except...

I'm honestly not all that confident I can make
something that will satisfy the entire school all
by myself...

But if someone else were to take the stage with me...
And if there were someone supporting me from the
shadows, I would feel much more reassured.
(Supporting her from the shadows...?)

If I had you with me, Cid, I just know I could do
anything... Can you help me, if you be so kind?

(In other words, a "shadow producer." That doesn't
sound bad at all!)

(The hot new idol, who burst onto the scene like a
shooting star...and behind her, the mysterious guy
who cranks out hits with laser-focused precision—
something like that!)

(Not quite a shadowbroker, but it could be a fun
change of pace.)
Okay. I'm in if you want me.
D-Do you mean it?!

Heehee, looks like we'll be working together closely
to craft the perfect performance, all the way up to
the ceremony!

Um, we actually need to find that other person to be
on stage with you...

O-Oh, that's right! Well, we can pool our efforts
there, too!

(The ceremony has gotta be a success, but what's the
fun in stopping there?)

(I'll make Rose into the biggest star in the academy,
no, the entire kingdom!)
(Yeah, as the Producer in Shadow!)
